transcripts.text: I've been seeing a lot of Cameron from the Capturing Christianity channel lately.  He's debated or made videos about some of my buddies and comrades, so I started watching his videos.  I'm going to be shitting on his arguments a bit here.  Actually, quite a bit.  But I want to be clear right up front.  I kind of like this cat.  He seems like a good guy.  He's genuine, sincere, and the reason I'm making this video...
